relevant_findings.general: Well appearing male, contracted left upper extremity, NAD, eyes closed for much of interview.
relevant_findings.cardiac: VAD hum heard throughout the precordium.
relevant_findings.abdomen: No erythema, warmth, or redness at site of driveline. Soft, distended, nontender.
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, no edema in either leg.
relevant_findings.neuro: MS WNL. CNs intact. Left UE contracted.
relevant_findings.skin: No significant skin lesions or rashes.

relevant_findings.lungs: CTAB, breathing comfortably on RA without use of accessory mm., no crackles/wheezes/rhonchi.
relevant_findings.heart: LVAD hum appreciated throughout the precordium, RRR.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, NT/ND. Laparoscopic incision sites line dressing intact visualized thru tegaderm without erythema. Normoactive bowel sounds.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Overall condition improved as indicated by stable vital signs and lack of distress during examination.
